attributes.action: Tighter control of environmental standards of utilities re: Thames Water
attributes.additional_details: To prevent profit taking when a utility organisationis seen not to be performing against service and environmental standards and tighten these and impose strict penslties on the board and shareholders if they fail
attributes.background: Legislate against sewage pollution in our inland and seaways appoint a cross party committee to review. Leadership under Caroline Lucas

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/635193
